author: sky.cactus
content: Need an EIPs repository admin (<@!187490121698770945> maybe?) to ban someone who is spamming the repository.

author: sky.cactus
content: Normally I report them and GitHub deletes their account, but this person decided to cough up the $5 for an account and so GitHub isn't banning them despite them continuing to spam.

author: sky.cactus
content: <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3609> is latest bit of spam, but they have been spamming the repo for about a week.

author: sky.cactus
content: (I don't have rights to ban people from the repo)
